refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates a DOM object of an XML document

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The function parses the XML document in str and returns an object of class "Dom document", having the properties as listed above. This function, domxml_open_file or domxml_new_doc must be called before any other function calls.

example.title: Opening a xml document in a string
example.programlisting:
<?php
include("example.inc");

if (!$dom = domxml_open_mem($xmlstr)) {
  echo "Error while parsing the document\n";
  exit;
}

$root = $dom->document_element();
?>
